      • connect

        Returns:

      • addEntry

        @POST
 @Consumes(value="application/x-www-form-urlencoded")
 @Path(value="collections")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
public String addEntry(@FormParam(value="sequence_number")
                                                                                                                                              int sequenceNumber,
                                                                                                                                              @FormParam(value="collection_name")
                                                                                                                                              String collectionName,
                                                                                                                                              @FormParam(value="directory")
                                                                                                                                              String directory,
                                                                                                                                              @FormParam(value="cycle")
                                                                                                                                              int cycle,
                                                                                                                                              @FormParam(value="mean_add")
                                                                                                                                              double meanAdd,
                                                                                                                                              @FormParam(value="mean_download")
                                                                                                                                              double meanDownload,
                                                                                                                                              @FormParam(value="stddev_add")
                                                                                                                                              double stdDevAdd,
                                                                                                                                              @FormParam(value="stddev_download")
                                                                                                                                              double stdDevDownload,
                                                                                                                                              @FormParam(value="state")
                                                                                                                                              int state,
                                                                                                                                              @FormParam(value="timestamp")
                                                                                                                                              String timestamp)
        POST method for adding or creating an element in the log file (for first phase of 2PC)
        Parameters:
        sequenceNumber - sequence number of the db write operation
        collectionName - name of the db collection
        directory - directory of the test result
        cycle - cycle of the test result
        meanAdd - Mean Execution time for the add operations in the submitted test
        meanDownload - Mean Execution time for the downloadoperations in the submitted test
        stdDevAdd - Standard Deviation of Execution time for the add operations in the submitted test
        stdDevDownload - Standard Deviation of Execution time for the download operations in the submitted test
        state - state of the test result
        timestamp - timestamp of the test result
        Returns:
        string containing the outcome of the operation

                                                                                                                                                        int sequenceNumber)
